recipes.label: Tough Crowd
recipes.startdescription: The crowds here have turned sour to me. My name is a curse here, and I will have trouble finding crewmembers, much less passengers. If I put my best face forward, I might be able to turn the crowd. [Approach this challenge with Heart or Grail.]

recipes.label: Turn the Crowd
recipes.description: As any performer knows, audiences are fickle. A few well placed words and this one was on my hand again.

recipes.label: Unwelcome!
recipes.description: The drinks I buy are hurled back at my face, and the door slams only inches from it.
